o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_AttributeMappingHasValidSourceObject
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that an attribute mapping has a vlid source object attached.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) ' Check whether the attribute mapping has a valid source object. ' This uses a function defined in the 'Validate' method. %Check% = AttributeMappingHasValidSourceObject(obj) End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Try to autofix the source object attached. SetSourceObjectOnAttributeMapping(obj)
' Check whether the fix was succesfull. %Fix% = AttributeMappingHasValidSourceObject(obj)
If (%Fix% = False) Then WriteError _ "Could not autofix source object on attribute mapping for entity : " & obj.ClassifierMap.Classifier.Code & _ " Mapping: " & obj.ClassifierMap.Code & " Attribute: " & obj.Feature.Code End If
%Fix% = False End Function
